publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6522 Ross Finnie: Support Foster Parent Drive—That the Parliament supports the campaign by Renfrewshire Council to encourage more people to become foster carers and adoptive parents, and welcomes the council’s aim of finding new homes for as many as 200 children and young people, many of whom have had a difficult upbringing and are in need a safe, stable and loving environment to call home.
